definitions: To look at all parts of (something) carefully in order to detect some feature.
To pass a scanner over or in front of in order to obtain an image or to read data.
To read quickly to find a specific piece of information.
To analyze the meter of a line of verse.
examples: The doctor will scan the patient for any abnormalities.
Please scan this document and email it to me.
I'll scan the article for the main points.
She can scan a poem to identify its rhythm.
